entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
